definitions.definition: Pertaining to demons or evil spirits ; demoniac .
examples: Convinced that his uncle was a warlock, he rifled through his attic, looking for demonic artifacts.
Once he had grasped the controls, he unleashed a demonic laugh that made his hostages shudder.

definitions.definition: Pertaining to daemons in ancient Greek thought; concerning supernatural ‘ genius ’.
Extremely cruel or evil; abhorrent or repugnant ; diabolical .

main_definition: Pertaining to demons or evil spirits ; demoniac .
secondary_definitions: Pertaining to daemons in ancient Greek thought; concerning supernatural ‘ genius ’.
( by extension ) Extremely cruel or evil; abhorrent or repugnant ; diabolical .
